attributes.action: Make parking in designated parent and child parking spaces illegal.
attributes.background: We struggle to find parking to enable us to get babies and prams safely out of the car. We have noticed that other drivers park in spaces with no child seats or child in the car and, when asked if they could park elsewhere, we receive abuse. I know we are not the only ones experiencing this issue.

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be calling for it to be made illegal for anyone to park in these spaces, which is probably not what you mean. 

You might be interested in this petition calling for regulation of these parking spaces:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106093
